gstreamer_function.c

7 #include <stdio.h>
8 #include <stdlib.h>
9 #include <time.h>
10 #include <string.h>
11 #include <glib-2.0/glib.h>
12 #include <gstreamer-1.0/gst/gst.h>
13 #include <gstreamer-1.0/gst/sdp/gstsdpmessage.h>
14 #include <gstreamer-1.0/gst/rtp/gstrtppayloads.h>
15 #include "../../include/announcement/gstreamer_function.h"

17 static const gchar *
18 gst_sdp_get_attribute_for_pt (const GstSDPMedia * media, const gchar * name,
19  gint pt)
20 {
21  guint i;
22 
23  for (i = 0;; i++) {
24  const gchar *attr;
25  gint val;
26 
27  if ((attr = gst_sdp_media_get_attribute_val_n (media, name, i)) == NULL)
28  break;
29 
30  if (sscanf (attr, "%d ", &val) != 1)
31  continue;
32 
33  if (val == pt)
34  return attr;
35  }
36  return NULL;
37 }
38 
39 #define PARSE_INT(p, del, res) \
40 G_STMT_START { \
41  gchar *t = p; \
42  p = strstr (p, del); \
43  if (p == NULL) \
44  res = -1; \
45  else { \
46  *p = '\0'; \
47  p++; \
48  res = atoi (t); \
49  } \
50 } G_STMT_END
51 
52 #define PARSE_STRING(p, del, res) \
53 G_STMT_START { \
54  gchar *t = p; \
55  p = strstr (p, del); \
56  if (p == NULL) { \
57  res = NULL; \
58  p = t; \
59  } \
60  else { \
61  *p = '\0'; \
62  p++; \
63  res = t; \
64  } \
65 } G_STMT_END
66 
67 #define SKIP_SPACES(p) \
68  while (*p && g_ascii_isspace (*p)) \
69  p++;
70 
71 /* rtpmap contains:
72  *
73  * <payload> <encoding_name>/<clock_rate>[/<encoding_params>]
74  */
75 static gboolean
76 gst_sdp_parse_rtpmap (const gchar * rtpmap, gint * payload, gchar ** name,
77  gint * rate, gchar ** params)
78 {
79  gchar *p, *t;
80 
81  p = (gchar *) rtpmap;
82 
83  PARSE_INT (p, " ", *payload);
84  if (*payload == -1)
85  return FALSE;
86 
87  SKIP_SPACES (p);
88  if (*p == '\0')
89  return FALSE;
90 
91  PARSE_STRING (p, "/", *name);
92  if (*name == NULL) {
93  GST_DEBUG ("no rate, name %s", p);
94  /* no rate, assume -1 then, this is not supposed to happen but RealMedia
95  * streams seem to omit the rate. */
96  *name = p;
97  *rate = -1;
98  return TRUE;
99  }
100 
101  t = p;
102  p = strstr (p, "/");
103  if (p == NULL) {
104  *rate = atoi (t);
105  return TRUE;
106  }
107  *p = '\0';
108  p++;
109  *rate = atoi (t);
110 
111  t = p;
112  if (*p == '\0')
113  return TRUE;
114  *params = t;
115 
116  return TRUE;
117 }
118 
136 GstCaps *
137 gst_sdp_media_get_caps_from_media (const GstSDPMedia * media, gint pt)
138 {
139  GstCaps *caps;
140  const gchar *rtpmap;
141  const gchar *fmtp;
142  const gchar *framesize;
143  gchar *name = NULL;
144  gint rate = -1;
145  gchar *params = NULL;
146  gchar *tmp;
147  GstStructure *s;
148  gint payload = 0;
149  gboolean ret;
150 
151  /* get and parse rtpmap */
152  rtpmap = gst_sdp_get_attribute_for_pt (media, "rtpmap", pt);
153 
154  if (rtpmap) {
155  ret = gst_sdp_parse_rtpmap (rtpmap, &payload, &name, &rate, &params);
156  if (!ret) {
157  GST_ERROR ("error parsing rtpmap, ignoring");
158  rtpmap = NULL;
159  }
160  }
161  /* dynamic payloads need rtpmap or we fail */
162  if (rtpmap == NULL && pt >= 96)
163  goto no_rtpmap;
164 
165  /* check if we have a rate, if not, we need to look up the rate from the
166  * default rates based on the payload types. */
167  if (rate == -1) {
168  const GstRTPPayloadInfo *info;
169 
170  if (GST_RTP_PAYLOAD_IS_DYNAMIC (pt)) {
171  /* dynamic types, use media and encoding_name */
172  tmp = g_ascii_strdown (media->media, -1);
173  info = gst_rtp_payload_info_for_name (tmp, name);
174  g_free (tmp);
175  } else {
176  /* static types, use payload type */
177  info = gst_rtp_payload_info_for_pt (pt);
178  }
179 
180  if (info) {
181  if ((rate = info->clock_rate) == 0)
182  rate = -1;
183  }
184  /* we fail if we cannot find one */
185  if (rate == -1)
186  goto no_rate;
187  }
188 
189  tmp = g_ascii_strdown (media->media, -1);
190  caps = gst_caps_new_simple ("application/x-rtp",
191  "media", G_TYPE_STRING, tmp, "payload", G_TYPE_INT, pt, NULL);
192  g_free (tmp);
193  s = gst_caps_get_structure (caps, 0);
194 
195  gst_structure_set (s, "clock-rate", G_TYPE_INT, rate, NULL);
196 
197  /* encoding name must be upper case */
198  if (name != NULL) {
199  tmp = g_ascii_strup (name, -1);
200  gst_structure_set (s, "encoding-name", G_TYPE_STRING, tmp, NULL);
201  g_free (tmp);
202  }
203 
204  /* params must be lower case */
205  if (params != NULL) {
206  tmp = g_ascii_strdown (params, -1);
207  gst_structure_set (s, "encoding-params", G_TYPE_STRING, tmp, NULL);
208  g_free (tmp);
209  }
210 
211  /* parse optional fmtp: field */
212  if ((fmtp = gst_sdp_get_attribute_for_pt (media, "fmtp", pt))) {
213  gchar *p;
214  gint payload = 0;
215 
216  p = (gchar *) fmtp;
217 
218  /* p is now of the format <payload> <param>[=<value>];... */
219  PARSE_INT (p, " ", payload);
220  if (payload != -1 && payload == pt) {
221  gchar **pairs;
222  gint i;
223 
224  /* <param>[=<value>] are separated with ';' */
225  pairs = g_strsplit (p, ";", 0);
226  for (i = 0; pairs[i]; i++) {
227  gchar *valpos;
228  const gchar *val, *key;
229  gint j;
230  const gchar *reserved_keys[] =
231  { "media", "payload", "clock-rate", "encoding-name",
232  "encoding-params"
233  };
234 
235  /* the key may not have a '=', the value can have other '='s */
236  valpos = strstr (pairs[i], "=");
237  if (valpos) {
238  /* we have a '=' and thus a value, remove the '=' with \0 */
239  *valpos = '\0';
240  /* value is everything between '=' and ';'. We split the pairs at ;
241  * boundaries so we can take the remainder of the value. Some servers
242  * put spaces around the value which we strip off here. Alternatively
243  * we could strip those spaces in the depayloaders should these spaces
244  * actually carry any meaning in the future. */
245  val = g_strstrip (valpos + 1);
246  } else {
247  /* simple <param>;.. is translated into <param>=1;... */
248  val = "1";
249  }
250  /* strip the key of spaces, convert key to lowercase but not the value. */
251  key = g_strstrip (pairs[i]);
252 
253  /* skip keys from the fmtp, which we already use ourselves for the
254  * caps. Some software is adding random things like clock-rate into
255  * the fmtp, and we would otherwise here set a string-typed clock-rate
256  * in the caps... and thus fail to create valid RTP caps
257  */
258  for (j = 0; j < G_N_ELEMENTS (reserved_keys); j++) {
259  if (g_ascii_strcasecmp (reserved_keys[j], key) == 0) {
260  key = "";
261  break;
262  }
263  }
264 
265  if (strlen (key) > 1) {
266  tmp = g_ascii_strdown (key, -1);
267  gst_structure_set (s, tmp, G_TYPE_STRING, val, NULL);
268  g_free (tmp);
269  }
270  }
271  g_strfreev (pairs);
272  }
273  }
274 
275  /* parse framesize: field */
276  if ((framesize = gst_sdp_media_get_attribute_val (media, "framesize"))) {
277  gchar *p;
278 
279  /* p is now of the format <payload> <width>-<height> */
280  p = (gchar *) framesize;
281 
282  PARSE_INT (p, " ", payload);
283  if (payload != -1 && payload == pt) {
284  gst_structure_set (s, "a-framesize", G_TYPE_STRING, p, NULL);
285  }
286  }
287 
288  return caps;
289 
290  /* ERRORS */
291 no_rtpmap:
292  {
293  GST_ERROR ("rtpmap type not given for dynamic payload %d", pt);
294  return NULL;
295  }
296 no_rate:
297  {
298  GST_ERROR ("rate unknown for payload type %d", pt);
299  return NULL;
300  }
301 }
302 
Generated by   1.8.11
